meanings.definition: A bone of a finger or toe.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally hit my phalange on the table.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined each phalange carefully during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chewed on my phalange, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate fingers moved like phalanges on the piano keys.
meanings.sent5: The X-ray showed a fracture in the phalange of my pinky finger.

meanings.definition: A military formation in which soldiers stand side by side in rows.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers marched in perfect phalange during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The general inspected the phalange of troops before the battle.
meanings.sent3: The phalange of soldiers moved like a well-oiled machine on the battlefield.
meanings.sent4: The phalange of protesters stood united against injustice.
meanings.sent5: The phalange of geese flew in a V formation across the sky.
